name: claude-skills
description: Claude Code Skills Collection - 一系列 Claude Code 技能的 npm 包

scripts.release:patch: pnpm version:patch && git add -A && git commit -m 'chore: bump versions' && pnpm publish:all && git push
scripts.release:minor: pnpm version:minor && git add -A && git commit -m 'chore: bump versions' && pnpm publish:all && git push
scripts.release:major: pnpm version:major && git add -A && git commit -m 'chore: bump versions' && pnpm publish:all && git push
scripts.release:weekly-report: pnpm --filter @adonis0123/weekly-report exec npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && git add -A && git commit -m 'chore: release weekly-report' && pnpm --filter @adonis0123/weekly-report publish --access public --no-git-checks && git push
scripts.release:agent-browser: pnpm --filter @adonis0123/agent-browser exec npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && git add -A && git commit -m 'chore: release agent-browser' && pnpm --filter @adonis0123/agent-browser publish --access public --no-git-checks && git push
scripts.release:react-best-practices: pnpm --filter @adonis0123/react-best-practices exec npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && git add -A && git commit -m 'chore: release react-best-practices' && pnpm --filter @adonis0123/react-best-practices publish --access public --no-git-checks && git push

author: adonis
